踒字的基本解释

踒
wō
扭伤：“折臂踒足，不能进酒。”

踒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wō］
［《廣韻》烏禾切，平戈，影。］
(1)足骨折断。泛指骨折。
(2)通“痿”。风痺病。参见“踒人”。
[②]［wēi］
［《集韻》邕危切，平支，影。］
见“踒2虵”。

踒字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　踒； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1227第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?烏禾切，音倭。【說文】足跌也。　又【集韻】烏臥切，音涴。義同。或作踠。　又【集韻】邕危切，音逶。【博雅】折也。【類篇】折足也。　又【集韻】儒隹切，音甤。?踒，兩足蹋也。張弩必以足，因爲弩名。或作?。

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Rush
wō
Sprain: "Folded arms and kicked feet, can't drink."
Rush
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wō］
["Guangyun" Wuhe cut, Ping Ge, shadow. ]
(1) The foot is broken. Refers to fractures in general.
(2) Through "failure". Fengbi disease. See "Ye Ren".
[②]［wēi］
["Ji Yun" Yong Wei cut, flat branch, shadow. ]
See "踒2虵".

[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Wuhe cut, sound widow. 【Said the text】Fall down.　 [Ji Yun] Wu lying and cutting, sound lingering. The same meaning. Or make it.　[Jiyun] Yong Weiqie, Yin Bei. [Bo Ya] Zheye. 【Classes】Folding feet also.　[Jiyun] Confucianism cut, sound 甤. ? Kick, kick with both feet.
